comments.text: It's a highway spot, but it has plenty of space on the side of it for cars to stop. A lot of traffic and drivers can see you from far. Got a ride to the city center of Pafos very quickly

Hitchhiking in Cyprus is extremely nice. Very good spot to leave Limassol in Pafos direction. It's after small fence. A lot of traffic and people turn to the highway so they go quite slow. There's space for cars to stop at the side of the road. Found a ride in a no time halfway to Pafos
Wait before the bus stop, plenty space to stop and plenty of drivers go either to nikosia or girne
Just cross the border by walk and hitchhike the cars passing by car, except the famagusta old town tour theres nothing here so it was wuite a dissappitment
Wanted to go to famagusta and got a ride up to the border in deryneia
Waited 5 mins, not many cars pass there though
A very good spot for both ways Polis/Pafos.
Walk past the "no pedestrian walking" sign. There's a space cars can stop 🛑. Better than standing in the traffic circle.
Common to stand at bus stops. Just stick out your thumb. North to Kyrenia (Girne). It's a straight shot.
Cars turning to Larnaca are going very slowly, you really have a good chance to hitch to Larnaca.  BUT there's no shade, no place to sit, so you're getting fried in the sun.

At the entrance of the highway direction to Larnaca in that case (cross the bridge for another direction). Just before the entrance there is a oil station but facing agia napa, and a bus stop and a lot of space to stop, but my experience is better when I hit my feet into the exit road. Cars from highway they are too fast but there is small chance to them to stop. Cars are often going to paphos. 2 persons hitchhiking, and a pickup with only 1 places free pickup us up. :-)
Not a perfect spot, but this is the only way from St. Hilarion junctino to Nicosia. There are place for cars to stop, but they are driving fast, so you must experiment with the exact location.

We stood just before the highway, behind the guard rail. Big sign saying no stopping / hitching. But... A car stopped before police we saw any police.
There are tunnels to get around the roundabout without playing Frogger in the road.
Hitch towards limmasol / larnaca / lefkosia (Nicosia)

The roundabout is hard for someone to stop in. They could, maybe, but it'd be dangerous and no one seemed to stop there. Also, not great luck at the gas station 6min walk from there.

After the roundabound, just when the highway starts, there is plenty of space for the cars to stop and they don't drive really fast. There is light for hitching at night.
